title: Help! Project minion animations lag me in teamfights.
body:
Dear Rito Rep. and Friends:

Do you guys lag in fights because of the Project minion animations?

I realized that my match will freeze in place at times because of the changes to graphics, so I've sadly turned them all off.

Devs, Reps: Is there ANYTHING I can do to fix this, so I can use the Project Minions without issue?

replies.body: There might be something more setting adjustments can't resolve.  Run through our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide in case this is being caused by driver issues or something else.  You can also use the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to force repatch and repair potentially bad game files that can't render properly.  I hope that helps!
